task: Develop a basic 'Pitfall!' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Decorate, decorate'.
name: Jungle Jewel Quest

branding_data.short_description: Embark on a treasure-hunting adventure through a vibrant, decorated jungle filled with challenges and hidden jewels.
branding_data.detailed_description: Jungle Jewel Quest is an adventurous platformer that takes inspiration from the classic 'Pitfall!' game, enhanced with the oblique strategy 'Decorate, decorate'. Players guide an intrepid explorer through a lush, visually stunning jungle environment, teeming with life and intricate details. The jungle is not only a backdrop but a character in itself, filled with vivid flora, exotic animals, and ancient ruins adorned with vibrant colors and intricate designs. As players swing from vines, leap over obstacles, and evade dangerous creatures, they must also collect hidden jewels and treasures scattered throughout the levels. Each area of the jungle is uniquely themed, offering a fresh and immersive experience as players progress. The game combines classic platforming mechanics with a rich, decorative art style, creating an engaging adventure for players of all ages.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
